All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.Scrollable, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
class PropertyText
extends javax.swing.JTextField

Support for a PropertyEditor that uses text. Isn't going to work well if the property gets changed somewhere other than this field simultaneously

Version:
$Revision: 1.5 $
Author:
Len Trigg (trigg@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
See Also:
